00069 int seekPackedFile(PackedFile *pf, int offset, int whence)
00070 {
00071     int oldseek = -1, seek = 0;
00072 
00073     if (pf) {
00074         oldseek = pf->seek;
00075         switch(whence) {
00076         case SEEK_CUR:
00077             seek = oldseek + offset;
00078             break;
00079         case SEEK_END:
00080             seek = pf->size + offset;
00081             break;
00082         case SEEK_SET:
00083             seek = offset;
00084             break;
00085         default:
00086             oldseek = -1;
00087         }
00088         if (seek < 0) {
00089             seek = 0;
00090         }
00091         else if (seek > pf->size) {
00092             seek = pf->size;
00093         }
00094         pf->seek = seek;
00095     }
00096 
00097     return(oldseek);
00098 }
00099     
00100 void rewindPackedFile(PackedFile *pf)
00101 {
00102     seekPackedFile(pf, 0, SEEK_SET);
00103 }
00104 
00105 int readPackedFile(PackedFile *pf, void *data, int size)
00106 { 
00107     if ((pf != NULL) && (size >= 0) && (data != NULL)) {
00108         if (size + pf->seek > pf->size) {
00109             size = pf->size - pf->seek;
00110         }
00111 
00112         if (size > 0) {
00113             memcpy(data, ((char *) pf->data) + pf->seek, size);
00114         }
00115         else {
00116             size = 0;
00117         }
00118 
00119         pf->seek += size;
00120     }
00121     else {
00122         size = -1;
00123     }
00124 
00125     return(size);
00126 }

00128 int countPackedFiles(Main *bmain)
00129 {
00130     Image *ima;
00131     VFont *vf;
00132     bSound *sound;
00133     int count = 0;
00134     
00135     // let's check if there are packed files...
00136     for (ima=bmain->image.first; ima; ima=ima->id.next)
00137         if (ima->packedfile)
00138             count++;
00139 
00140     for (vf=bmain->vfont.first; vf; vf=vf->id.next)
00141         if (vf->packedfile)
00142             count++;
00143 
00144     for (sound=bmain->sound.first; sound; sound=sound->id.next)
00145         if (sound->packedfile)
00146             count++;
00147 
00148     return count;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void freePackedFile(PackedFile *pf)
00152 {
00153     if (pf) {
00154         MEM_freeN(pf->data);
00155         MEM_freeN(pf);
00156     }
00157     else
00158         printf("freePackedFile: Trying to free a NULL pointer\n");
00159 }
00160     
00161 PackedFile *newPackedFileMemory(void *mem, int memlen)
00162 {
00163     PackedFile *pf = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*pf), "PackedFile");
00164     pf->data = mem;
00165     pf->size = memlen;
00166     
00167     return pf;
00168 }
00169 
00170 PackedFile *newPackedFile(ReportList *reports, const char *filename, const char *basepath)
00171 {
00172     PackedFile *pf = NULL;
00173     int file, filelen;
00174     char name[FILE_MAX];
00175     void *data;
00176     
00177     /* render result has no filename and can be ignored
00178      * any other files with no name can be ignored too */
00179     if (filename[0]=='\0')
00180         return NULL;
00181 
00182     //XXX waitcursor(1);
00183     
00184     // convert relative filenames to absolute filenames
00185     
00186     BLI_strncpy(name, filename, sizeof(name));
00187     BLI_path_abs(name, basepath);
00188     
00189     // open the file
00190     // and create a PackedFile structure
00191 
00192     file= BLI_open(name, O_BINARY|O_RDONLY,0);
00193     if (file <= 0) {
00194         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to pack file, source path not found: \"%s\"", name);
00195     }
00196     else {
00197         filelen = BLI_file_descriptor_size(file);
00198 
00199         if (filelen == 0) {
00200             // MEM_mallocN complains about MEM_mallocN(0, "bla");
00201             // we don't care....
00202             data = MEM_mallocN(1, "packFile");
00203         }
00204         else {
00205             data = MEM_mallocN(filelen, "packFile");
00206         }
00207         if (read(file, data, filelen) == filelen) {
00208             pf = newPackedFileMemory(data, filelen);
00209         }
00210 
00211         close(file);
00212     }
00213 
00214     //XXX waitcursor(0);
00215         
00216     return (pf);
00217 }
00218 
00219 void packAll(Main *bmain, ReportList *reports)
00220 {
00221     Image *ima;
00222     VFont *vf;
00223     bSound *sound;
00224     
00225     for (ima=bmain->image.first; ima; ima=ima->id.next) {
00226         if (ima->packedfile == NULL && ima->id.lib==NULL) { 
00227             if (ima->source==IMA_SRC_FILE) {
00228                 ima->packedfile = newPackedFile(reports, ima->name, ID_BLEND_PATH(bmain, &ima->id));
00229             }
00230             else if (ELEM(ima->source, IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE, IMA_SRC_MOVIE)) {
00231                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Image '%s' skipped, movies and image sequences not supported.", ima->id.name+2);
00232             }
00233         }
00234     }
00235 
00236     for (vf=bmain->vfont.first; vf; vf=vf->id.next)
00237         if (vf->packedfile == NULL && vf->id.lib==NULL && strcmp(vf->name, FO_BUILTIN_NAME) != 0)
00238             vf->packedfile = newPackedFile(reports, vf->name, bmain->name);
00239 
00240     for (sound=bmain->sound.first; sound; sound=sound->id.next)
00241         if (sound->packedfile == NULL && sound->id.lib==NULL)
00242             sound->packedfile = newPackedFile(reports, sound->name, bmain->name);
00243 }

00251 static char *find_new_name(char *name)
00252 {
00253     char tempname[FILE_MAX];
00254     char *newname;
00255     size_t len;
00256     
00257     if (fop_exists(name)) {
00258         for (number = 1; number <= 999; number++) {
00259             BLI_snprintf(tempname, sizeof(tempname), "%s.%03d", name, number);
00260             if (! fop_exists(tempname)) {
00261                 break;
00262             }
00263         }
00264     }
00265     len= strlen(tempname) + 1;
00266     newname = MEM_mallocN(len, "find_new_name");
00267     memcpy(newname, tempname, len * sizeof(char));
00268     return newname;
00269 }
00270 #endif
00271 
00272 int writePackedFile(ReportList *reports, const char *filename, PackedFile *pf, int guimode)
00273 {
00274     int file, number, remove_tmp = FALSE;
00275     int ret_value = RET_OK;
00276     char name[FILE_MAX];
00277     char tempname[FILE_MAX];
00278 /*      void *data; */
00279     
00280     if (guimode) {} //XXX  waitcursor(1);
00281     
00282     BLI_strncpy(name, filename, sizeof(name));
00283     BLI_path_abs(name, G.main->name);
00284     
00285     if (BLI_exists(name)) {
00286         for (number = 1; number <= 999; number++) {
00287             BLI_snprintf(tempname, sizeof(tempname), "%s.%03d_", name, number);
00288             if (! BLI_exists(tempname)) {
00289                 if (BLI_copy(name, tempname) == RET_OK) {
00290                     remove_tmp = TRUE;
00291                 }
00292                 break;
00293             }
00294         }
00295     }
00296     
00297     // make sure the path to the file exists...
00298     BLI_make_existing_file(name);
00299     
00300     file = BLI_open(name, O_BINARY + O_WRONLY + O_CREAT + O_TRUNC, 0666);
00301     if (file >= 0) {
00302         if (write(file, pf->data, pf->size) != pf->size) {
00303             BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error writing file: %s", name);
00304             ret_value = RET_ERROR;
00305         }
00306         close(file);
00307     }
00308     else {
00309         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error creating file: %s", name);
00310         ret_value = RET_ERROR;
00311     }
00312     
00313     if (remove_tmp) {
00314         if (ret_value == RET_ERROR) {
00315             if (BLI_rename(tempname, name) != 0) {
00316                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error restoring tempfile. Check files: '%s' '%s'", tempname, name);
00317             }
00318         }
00319         else {
00320             if (BLI_delete(tempname, 0, 0) != 0) {
00321                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error deleting '%s' (ignored)", tempname);
00322             }
00323         }
00324     }
00325     
00326     if (guimode) {} //XXX waitcursor(0);
00327 
00328     return (ret_value);
00329 }
00330     
00331 /*
00332  * This function compares a packed file to a 'real' file.
00333  * It returns an integer indicating if:
00334  *
00335  * PF_EQUAL     - the packed file and original file are identical
00336  * PF_DIFFERENT - the packed file and original file differ
00337  * PF_NOFILE    - the original file doens't exist
00338  */
00339 
00340 int checkPackedFile(const char *filename, PackedFile *pf)
00341 {
00342     struct stat st;
00343     int ret_val, i, len, file;
00344     char buf[4096];
00345     char name[FILE_MAX];
00346     
00347     BLI_strncpy(name, filename, sizeof(name));
00348     BLI_path_abs(name, G.main->name);
00349     
00350     if (stat(name, &st)) {
00351         ret_val = PF_NOFILE;
00352     }
00353     else if (st.st_size != pf->size) {
00354         ret_val = PF_DIFFERS;
00355     }
00356     else {
00357         // we'll have to compare the two...
00358         
00359         file = BLI_open(name, O_BINARY | O_RDONLY, 0);
00360         if (file < 0) {
00361             ret_val = PF_NOFILE;
00362         }
00363         else {
00364             ret_val = PF_EQUAL;
00365             
00366             for (i = 0; i < pf->size; i += sizeof(buf)) {
00367                 len = pf->size - i;
00368                 if (len > sizeof(buf)) {
00369                     len = sizeof(buf);
00370                 }
00371                 
00372                 if (read(file, buf, len) != len) {
00373                     // read error ...
00374                     ret_val = PF_DIFFERS;
00375                     break;
00376                 }
00377                 else {
00378                     if (memcmp(buf, ((char *)pf->data) + i, len)) {
00379                         ret_val = PF_DIFFERS;
00380                         break;
00381                     }
00382                 }
00383             }
00384             
00385             close(file);
00386         }
00387     }
00388     
00389     return(ret_val);
00390 }
00391 
00392 /* unpackFile() looks at the existing files (abs_name, local_name) and a packed file.
00393  *
00394  * It returns a char *to the existing file name / new file name or NULL when
00395  * there was an error or when the user decides to cancel the operation.
00396  */
00397 
00398 char *unpackFile(ReportList *reports, const char *abs_name, const char *local_name, PackedFile *pf, int how)
00399 {
00400     char *newname = NULL;
00401     const char *temp = NULL;
00402     
00403     // char newabs[FILE_MAX];
00404     // char newlocal[FILE_MAX];
00405     
00406     if (pf != NULL) {
00407         switch (how) {
00408             case -1:
00409             case PF_KEEP:
00410                 break;
00411             case PF_REMOVE:
00412                 temp= abs_name;
00413                 break;
00414             case PF_USE_LOCAL:
00415                 // if file exists use it
00416                 if (BLI_exists(local_name)) {
00417                     temp = local_name;
00418                     break;
00419                 }
00420                 // else fall through and create it
00421             case PF_WRITE_LOCAL:
00422                 if (writePackedFile(reports, local_name, pf, 1) == RET_OK) {
00423                     temp = local_name;
00424                 }
00425                 break;
00426             case PF_USE_ORIGINAL:
00427                 // if file exists use it
00428                 if (BLI_exists(abs_name)) {
00429                     temp = abs_name;
00430                     break;
00431                 }
00432                 // else fall through and create it
00433             case PF_WRITE_ORIGINAL:
00434                 if (writePackedFile(reports, abs_name, pf, 1) == RET_OK) {
00435                     temp = abs_name;
00436                 }
00437                 break;
00438             default:
00439                 printf("unpackFile: unknown return_value %d\n", how);
00440                 break;
00441         }
00442         
00443         if (temp) {
00444             newname= BLI_strdup(temp);
00445         }
00446     }
00447     
00448     return newname;
00449 }

00451 
00452 int unpackVFont(ReportList *reports, VFont *vfont, int how)
00453 {
00454     char localname[FILE_MAX], fi[FILE_MAXFILE];
00455     char *newname;
00456     int ret_value = RET_ERROR;
00457     
00458     if (vfont != NULL) {
00459         BLI_strncpy(localname, vfont->name, sizeof(localname));
00460         BLI_splitdirstring(localname, fi);
00461         
00462         BLI_snprintf(localname, sizeof(localname), "//fonts/%s", fi);
00463         
00464         newname = unpackFile(reports, vfont->name, localname, vfont->packedfile, how);
00465         if (newname != NULL) {
00466             ret_value = RET_OK;
00467             freePackedFile(vfont->packedfile);
00468             vfont->packedfile = NULL;
00469             BLI_strncpy(vfont->name, newname, sizeof(vfont->name));
00470             MEM_freeN(newname);
00471         }
00472     }
00473     
00474     return (ret_value);
00475 }
00476 
00477 int unpackSound(Main *bmain, ReportList *reports, bSound *sound, int how)
00478 {
00479     char localname[FILE_MAXDIR + FILE_MAX], fi[FILE_MAX];
00480     char *newname;
00481     int ret_value = RET_ERROR;
00482 
00483     if (sound != NULL) {
00484         BLI_strncpy(localname, sound->name, sizeof(localname));
00485         BLI_splitdirstring(localname, fi);
00486         BLI_snprintf(localname, sizeof(localname), "//sounds/%s", fi);
00487 
00488         newname = unpackFile(reports, sound->name, localname, sound->packedfile, how);
00489         if (newname != NULL) {
00490             BLI_strncpy(sound->name, newname, sizeof(sound->name));
00491             MEM_freeN(newname);
00492 
00493             freePackedFile(sound->packedfile);
00494             sound->packedfile = NULL;
00495 
00496             sound_load(bmain, sound);
00497 
00498             ret_value = RET_OK;
00499         }
00500     }
00501     
00502     return(ret_value);
00503 }
00504 
00505 int unpackImage(ReportList *reports, Image *ima, int how)
00506 {
00507     char localname[FILE_MAXDIR + FILE_MAX], fi[FILE_MAX];
00508     char *newname;
00509     int ret_value = RET_ERROR;
00510     
00511     if (ima != NULL && ima->name[0]) {
00512         BLI_strncpy(localname, ima->name, sizeof(localname));
00513         BLI_splitdirstring(localname, fi);
00514         BLI_snprintf(localname, sizeof(localname), "//textures/%s", fi);
00515 
00516         newname = unpackFile(reports, ima->name, localname, ima->packedfile, how);
00517         if (newname != NULL) {
00518             ret_value = RET_OK;
00519             freePackedFile(ima->packedfile);
00520             ima->packedfile = NULL;
00521             BLI_strncpy(ima->name, newname, sizeof(ima->name));
00522             MEM_freeN(newname);
00523             BKE_image_signal(ima, NULL, IMA_SIGNAL_RELOAD);
00524         }
00525     }
00526     
00527     return(ret_value);
00528 }
00529 
00530 void unpackAll(Main *bmain, ReportList *reports, int how)
00531 {
00532     Image *ima;
00533     VFont *vf;
00534     bSound *sound;
00535 
00536     for (ima=bmain->image.first; ima; ima=ima->id.next)
00537         if (ima->packedfile)
00538             unpackImage(reports, ima, how);
00539 
00540     for (vf=bmain->vfont.first; vf; vf=vf->id.next)
00541         if (vf->packedfile)
00542             unpackVFont(reports, vf, how);
00543 
00544     for (sound=bmain->sound.first; sound; sound=sound->id.next)
00545         if (sound->packedfile)
00546             unpackSound(bmain, reports, sound, how);
00547 }
